charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant imprisonment for 120 months on Count 2 of the Indictment. Defendant ordered to pay a total fine of $15,000.00. Five (5) years supervised release. Pay $100 special assessment to the United States, which is due immediately. Defendan t informed of right to appeal. It is recommended that the defendant participate in the 500 hour drug program. It is further recommended that the defendant be designated to Terminal Island or Southern California to facilitate family visitation.
